top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Wow, the prices of prefinished maple plywood sure have gone up since last year when I bought my 26 sheets. I only paid $200 for 26 sheets! 





Thank goodness for buddies that work at a plywood mill, lol!!
makes every guy want a CNC
